meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a stalk in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The tall, thin plant had a stalklike stem that swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The cornstalk had a stalklike structure that supported the growing ears of corn.
meanings.sent3: The stalklike scarecrow in the field seemed to be watching over the crops.
meanings.sent4: Her stalklike fingers reached out to grab the attention of the passing butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the tree cast a stalklike silhouette on the ground.
